column2: INSIGHT-Boeing uses its clout to control supplier consolidation NEW YORK
column3: Aug 30 Berkshire Hathaway Inc's  $37 billion deal for aerospace supplier Precision Castparts Corp is encouraging investors to consolidate the fragmented aircraft components industry
column4: even as Boeing Co  uses its clout as the world's biggest plane maker to put a check on some deals.
